section.title: Service types
section.para: The Service catalog provides information about Rackspace Cloud services available to customers that have successfully authenticated, including the API service endpoints to access the service. Customers can view service catalog details in the authentication response returned by the Identity service.
Each service has a unique name and an associated service type that identities the function that the service provides.

Service and Identity administrators can use the Identity API to manage service configuration and the API capabilities supported by a service. For details, see the following documentation:
Service operations
Service API operations
